name: equidistantly
content:

in such a way that the distances between things are equal: The five lights were positioned equidistantly below each other. The spots on the fabric are equidistantly spaced. Related word
equidistant
More examplesFewer examplesShe put the document in one of the trays that were positioned equidistantly from each other on her desk.The numbers are arranged equidistantly in a circle around the edge of the clock face.One box was located centrally with the other five positioned equidistantly around it.The town is located equidistantly between the state's two main cities.The samples were cut into sections and arranged equidistantly in the dishes.
